Top
Top​(Top)

Purpose: Top-level SystemC module that instantiates and connects an initiator component with a memory component.  Creates the basic structure for the TLM-2 communication example.

Variables
initiator
Initiator *initiator

Pointer to the Initiator component that generates transactions.

memory
Memory *memory

Pointer to the Memory component that responds to transactions.

Functions
Top
SC_CTOR(
Top
)

Creates the initiator and memory components and binds their sockets together to enable communication.
